credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Mausoleum (or Library)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
description: Horizontal rectangle. A variation of the design -1128, the plan of the surrounding colonnade being square with steeples in the corners. Originally a part of the same sheet as -1132. Colored background. The design was first made on a smaller scale, and lower.
name: Drawing
